name: Python Code Evaluation Rubric
description: Standard rubric for evaluating Python programming assignments

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.description: Evaluate code readability, naming conventions, proper indentation, and adherence to PEP 8 style guidelines. Check for meaningful variable names, appropriate comments, and clean code structure.

criteria.name: Functionality
criteria.description: Evaluate if the code correctly solves the problem. Check for correct logic, proper handling of edge cases, expected input/output behavior, and absence of bugs.

criteria.name: Documentation
criteria.description: Evaluate the quality of documentation including docstrings, inline comments explaining complex logic, and overall code explanation. Check if the purpose and usage of functions are clear.
